item.title: Public Preview: Entra ID support for RDP connections in portal
item.description: Overview Azure Bastion provides secure RDP and SSH access to Azure virtual machines directly via the Azure portal or via the native SSH/RDP client already installed on your local computer. Previously, Bastion supported Entra ID authentication (formerly AAD) for RDP and SSH connections via native client and for SSH connections via the portal. Today, we are introducing public preview for Entra ID support for RDP connections in the portal, delivering a more seamless and secure experience for users. Why Entra ID authentication?
